text: Pier 39 is a place in San Francisco. It is a popular place for tourists and has many things to do. There are many restaurants, shops, street performances, and a video arcade. Pier 39 is home to many sea lions and a two-level carousel at the end of the pier. Pier 39 was first developed by Warren Simmons and opened October 4, 1978. ==References== ==Other websites== *Official site Category:Buildings and structures in San Francisco Category:Landmarks in San Francisco Category:1978 establishments in California
title: Pier 39
